ingredients: 8 ounces of skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
Olive Oil to coat chicken for roasting
2 tablespoons all-purpose flour (I think skipping this ingredient would make the sauce mixture better)
2 Poblano Chili Peppers, roasted, seeded and ribbed
Salsa and/or thinly sliced green onion (optional)
Salsa and/or thinly sliced green onion (optional)
